name: Candy Stripe Festive Wreath
description:
A handmade candy stripe festive wreath with x5 handcrafted fabric stars and hearts decorations and x4 red gingham mini bows and a larger green stripe ribbon bow.

The candy stripe festive wreath is a great addition to your Christmas decorations. Hung over the front door to greet your guests, or hung within your home, this is a lovely alternative to a traditional foliage wreath adding a homespun cottage feel to a keepsake decoration.

You can PERSONALISE your wreath with your family name for no extra cost. Your name is then freehand machine embroidered onto a fabric tag that is then hung in the centre of your wreath.
For example - The Laing Family Christmas (see pictured)

Wreath - 100% wicker, 30cm diameter x 4cm depth

Decorations - x2 stars-12cm x 12cm, x3 hearts-10cm x 8cm.
100% cotton filled with polyester filling

Bows - x3 red mini gingham x1 green stripe

name: Festive Hearts Wreath
description:
A handmade festive hearts wreath with x6 handcrafted fabric heart decorations and x6 red gingham mini bows.

The festive hearts wreath is a great addition to your Christmas decorations. Hung over the front door to greet your guests, or hung within your home, this is a lovely alternative to a traditional foliage wreath adding a homespun cottage feel to a keepsake decoration.

You can PERSONALISE your wreath with your family name for no extra cost. Your name is then freehand machine embroidered onto a fabric tag that is then hung in the centre of your wreath.
For example - The Laing Family Christmas (see pictured)
EMAIL ME ONCE YOU HAVE ORDERED WITH YOUR FAMILY NAME

Wreath - 100% wicker, 30cm diameter x 4cm depth

Decorations - x3 white hearts-10cm x 8cm, x3 red hearts-10cm x 8cm-100% cotton filled with polyester filling

Bows - x6 red mini gingham

name: Stars & Stockings Festive Wreath
description:
A handmade festive wreath with x4 handcrafted fabric stars and stocking decorations and x3 red gingham mini bows and a larger green stripe ribbon bow.

The Stars & Stockings festive wreath is a great addition to your Christmas decorations. Hung over the front door to greet your guests, or hung within your home, this is a lovely alternative to a traditional foliage wreath adding a homespun cottage feel to a keepsake decoration.

You can PERSONALISE your wreath with your family name freehand machine embroidered onto a fabric tag that is then hung in the centre of your wreath.
For example - The Laing Family Christmas (see pictured)

Wreath - 100% wicker, 30cm diameter x 4cm depth

Decorations - x2 stars 12cm x 12cm, x2 stockings 13cm x 9cm.
100% cotton filled with polyester filling

Bows - x3 red mini gingham x1 green stripe

name: Personalised Candy Stripe Bow Stocking
description:
The personalised Candy Stripe Bow Stocking is a beautiful handcrafted keepsake for both children and adults to be used every Christmas. 

Each festive Stocking is handcrafted in Great Britain and is Available in red polka dot fabric with a natural linen top panel and red ticking stripe bow - as pictured

Made with 100% cotton and linen and fully lined with 100% cotton. Each Stocking has a ribbon tie hook to hang it from.

Size - approx 27cm wide x 55cm length
Due to the detailing, washing is not recommended.

TO PERSONALISE YOUR STOCKING FREE OF CHARGE, POP ME A LITTLE EMAIL WITH THE NAME YOU WOULD LIKE EMBROIDERED ON.

Your chosen name will then be free-hand machine embroidered onto a linen tag along with a button stitched on. It will then have a twine ribbon tied to the stocking to resemble a luggage label (as pictured)

name: Personalised Christmas Treats Stocking
description:
The personalised Christmas Treats Stocking is a beautiful keepsake for your family or as a unique gift. 

Each stocking is handcrafted in Great Britain with love and care.

The Christmas Treats stocking has a free hand machine embroidered tag with the words 'Christmas treats' embroidered on. It also has appliqued detailing with holly leaves and berries.

Made with 100% linen and cotton fabrics and is fully lined with 100% cotton.

Size - approx 27cm wide x 55cm length
Due to the detailing, washing is not recommended.

TO PERSONALISE YOUR STOCKING FREE OF CHARGE, POP ME A LITTLE EMAIL WITH THE NAME YOU WOULD LIKE EMBROIDERED ON. 

I will free-hand machine embroider your chosen name onto a linen tag and stitch it onto the top cuff of the stocking (as pictured)

name: Personalised Santa's Little Helper Stocking
description:
The personalised Santa's Little Helper Stocking is perfect for children and adults. It is a lovely keepsake that can be used and cherished for many Christmases to come.

Each Santa's Little Helper Stocking has a blue star embroidered on the front. It also has a fabric tag hand printed with the words 'Santa's Little Helper' and machine stitched on, along with a string tie and button hand embroidered onto the stocking. Each Stocking has a ribbon tie hook to hang it from.

Available in red ticking stripe with a red mini polka dot cuff - as pictured.

By Alex festive Stockings are handcrafted in Great Britain and are 100% cotton and fully lined with 100% cotton. 

Size - approx 27cm wide x 55cm length
Due to the detailing, washing is not recommended.

TO PERSONALISE YOUR STOCKING FREE OF CHARGE, POP ME A LITTLE EMAIL WITH THE NAME YOU WOULD LIKE EMBROIDERED ON.
Your chosen name will be free-hand machine embroidered onto a linen tag and stitched onto the top cuff (as pictured)

name: The Great British Weather Apron
description:
Inspired by what the UK is best known for......The Great British Weather.....Rain & Brollies!!

Alex's Aprons make a fabulous gift and are the perfect accessory in the kitchen this festive season whilst preparing all your Christmas feasts. 

This Apron is available in Alex's Great British Weather fabric and her Umbrella Polka Dot fabric (sold on a separate page)

Alex's Aprons are machine washable at 40 degrees and have an adjustable D-Ring around the neck to alter the fit.

All of the Umbrella collection is designed, printed and handmade in Great Britain.

Sold Individually

100% cotton apron

59cm x 85cm
Photography by Binky Nixon

name: Sketch Umbrella Shopper
description:
Inspired by what the UK is best known for......The Great British Weather......rain and brollies!!

This Shopper bag is made using Alex's Sketch Umbrella designed fabric. It is double sided with the design on both the front and back of the bag. It also has side panels and a gusset and contrasting straps in mint polka dot cotton.  

The Sketch Umbrella Shopper is a perfect bag for everyday use. It is large enough to carry an A4 folder and books as well as lots of groceries! It also makes a lovely unique gift.

All of the Umbrella collection is designed, printed and handmade in Great Britain.

Made with 100% cotton

Size - Approx 38cm x 38cm
Wash on a cool cycle.
Photography by Binky Nixon

name: Mint Polka Dot Notebooks
description:
Inspired by what the UK is best known for......The Great British Weather......rain and brollies!!

The Notebooks are covered in Alex's Mint Polka Dot designed fabric and are available as A5 or A6 portrait sized ruled books. They are perfect for writing notes or writing your Christmas wish list in! 

When your notebook is full you can remove the cover and use again on other hard-back notebooks or diaries.

The notebooks fit neatly into a handbag and make a lovely gift. All of the Umbrella collection is designed, printed and handmade in Great Britain.

The notebooks are fully lined in medium weight white cotton.

Cover - 100% cotton fabric.

A5- 21.5cm x 15cm

name: Pom Pom Festive Wreath
description:
The handmade pom pom festive wreath is the perfect addition to your Christmas decorations and home. Hung over your front door to greet your guests, or hung within your home over a mantlepiece or on a wall, the pom pom festive wreath is a lovely alternative to a traditional foliage wreath. 

The pom pom festive wreath can be hung up every Christmas, making it a special festive keepsake decoration for the family to enjoy for years to come.

You can personalise your wreath for your own family with a freehand machine embroidered fabric tag hung in the middle of the wreath with your family name stitched on.

For example: The Laing family Christmas (please see pictures)

Wreath - wire frame

Fabric flower pom poms - x33 handcrafted pom poms in x4 festive festive fabrics. 100% cotton.

Wreath dimensions - 39cm diameter, 6cm depth

Flower pom pom dimensions - 7cm diameter each

name: By Alex Christmas Cards - 8 pack
description:
A set of x8 festive Christmas cards all printed in the UK. 

The By Alex Christmas cards are the perfect set to send to friends and family who appreciate receiving something unique and original. They feature my embroidered designs from my new Christmas napkin sets printed onto cards.

Each card has been left blank for you to write your own festive message and is tied with twine and a By Alex ribbon.

Each pack contains x8 cards and x8 peel and seal envelopes.

x2 Robin red breast, x2 Christmas pud, x2 holly leaves and berries and x2 stars.

Each card has been printed in the UK 

card size - 14cm x 14cm

name: Candy Stripe Decoration Bundle
description:
SET OF 4 DECORATIONS

Perfect Christmas Decorations for your Christmas tree.

Each Decoration is handmade in Great Britain and is 100% cotton and filled with polyester filling. 

Each Decoration is hand printed with 4 individual  words - 'Twinkle Twinkle' -  'Love' - 'I Believe in Santa' - 'Noel'

Each bundle contains x2 Star Decorations and x2 Heart Decorations, as pictured and is hung with twine ties and presented tied together with twine and a By Alex bow.

Size - Star 12cm x 12cm - Heart 10cm x 10cm

name: Bundle of Hearts Decorations
description:
SET OF 4 DECORATIONS

Perfect Christmas decorations for your Christmas tree.

Each Decoration is handmade in Great Britain and 100% Cotton and filled with polyester filling.

Each bundle contains x2 red hearts and x2 cream hearts and is hung with twine ties and is presented tied together with twine and a By Alex bow.

Give your home some festive twinkle! x

Size - 10cm x 8cm each

name: Stars & Stockings Decoration Bundle
description:
SET OF 4 DECORATIONS

Perfect for your Christmas Tree this festive season.

Each decoration is handmade in Great Britain and 100% cotton and filled with polyester filling.

Each decoration bundle contains x2 star decorations wth smaller appliqued stars embroidered on and x2 stocking decorations and is hung with twine ties and presented tied together with twine and a By Alex bow.

Size - Star - 12cm x 8cm - 
          Stocking - 12cm x 12cm

name: Fabric Cake Pops
description:
Gorgeous NEW wedding table favours!!

Works as your table place name for your guest as well as their little keepsake favour from the day!

Weather you have a small wedding of 2 or a large gathering of 150, each of your guests can have their own keepsake favour, with each one personalised with your guests name or title handprinted on. Placed at each table setting, these favours are unique, handcrafted and full of prettiness to transform your tables.

You can choose from the colours shown in the images, creating a colour palette to suit your wedding. Weather you have one tonal colour, or have a range of all the colours, it is entirely up to you.

*Once you have placed your order and selected your quantity, email me your list of guests names that you would like handprinted on each favour as well as the colour(s) you would like*

Priced individually.

name: Floral Pompom buttonhole
description:
After recently celebrating my own marriage and making all my bouquets, buttonholes and decorations, I know how important is it to have special keepsakes of your most special day.

My fabric buttonholes are made up of  x3 mini flowers. You can have the same as my buttonholes, (as pictured) or you can mix and match the available colours from the list below. You can even stick to the one colour if you would prefer it to tie in with your colour scheme and the bridal bouquets

Each flower is handcrafted and assembled by hand. A badge pin is then glued onto the back of the stem.

I made fabric buttonholes in two colour groups for my groom, his best man, ushers and my dad to tie them all in with the bridal party. My Fabric buttonholes are to be enjoyed on your wedding and kept as a beautiful reminder of the day.

Sold as an individual buttonhole.

*Once you have placed your order please email me with your colour choices if you selected 'Specific Colours'*

Photography by Emma Lucy Photography

name: Fabric Bridal Bouquet
description:
After recently celebrating my own marriage and making all my bouquets, buttonholes and decorations, I know how important is it to have special keepsakes of your most special day. My wedding bouquet is displayed in my house, still as fresh as it was on the day.

My fabric bouquets are made up of 12 full flowers. You can have the same as mine, or you can mix and match your colours from the list below. You can even stick to the one colour if you would prefer it to tie in with your colour scheme.

Each flower is handcrafted and assembled by hand. I then tie a ribbon bow around the handle. You can also tie on one of my bouquet tokens around the stem, personalised especially for your day (please see bouquet token page).

My Fabric bouquets are to be enjoyed on your wedding and for many many years to come as a beautiful reminder of your day.

You can also order bridesmaid's posies to tie in with your bouquet, as I did. These are half the size of the bridal bouquet. (please see Posie bouquet page) and make the perfect keepsake for your maids.

*Once you have placed your order, please email me with specific colour choices if you have selected  'a mix of colours'*

Sold as an individual Bridal bouquet

Photography by Emma Lucy Photography

name: Fabric Bridesmaid Posies
description:
AS FEATURED IN YOU & YOUR WEDDING MAGAZINE MARCH/APRIL 2013 ISSUE

After recently celebrating my own marriage and making all my bouquets, buttonholes and decorations, I know how important is it to have special keepsakes of your most special day. My wedding bouquet is displayed in my house, still as fresh as it was on the day.

The Bridesmaids posies have a total of 7 full flowers plus stems. You can have the same as mine (as pictured) or you can mix and match the available colours you would like. You can even stick to the one colour if you would prefer it to tie in with your colour scheme.

Each flower is handcrafted and assembled by hand. I then tie a bow around the handle base.

My Fabric bouquets are the perfect gift for your maids to cherish.

*Once you have placed your order please email me with your colour choices if you selected 'mix of colours'*

Sold as an individual bridesmaid posie

Photography by Emma Lucy Photography and Binky Nixon Photography.

name: Flower Buttonholes
description:
The Flower Buttonholes are the perfect keepsake for your special day. Made for the Groom and his entourage in colours that will coordinate with your day and bride.

My Flower buttonholes are handcrafted with 5 petals with a pom pom centre. They have a twine stem and badge fastening on the back to attach to your jacket lapel, braces or shirt.

You can choose from the colours listed below and create a mix of shades or just stick with the one colour. You can make the Grooms buttonhole different to the rest of the bridal party, give the ushers alternating colours or tie it in with the colours of the bridal bouquet. You can really play with the fabric colours to suit your wedding palette and theme for the day. 

Most importantly, being handcrafted in cotton fabrics, they will not wilt during the day and can be kept as a reminder for years to come.

*Once you have placed your order, please email me your colour choices if you selected 'specific colours'*

Sold as an individual buttonhole.

Flower size - 6cm x 6cm
stem length - 5cm

name: Wedding Keepsake Frame
description:
The Wedding Keepsake Frame is a beautiful gift to give to the married couple. Personalised with the Bride and Grooms name, date of marriage and venue it is the perfect special gift.

It is also a lovely idea as a table decoration on your big day, either on the top table or near your guest book. Or why not make somebodies Wedding Anniversary super special. whether it be their first wedding anniversary, or their 60th! Mark the occasion with something made especially for them.

The Wedding Keepsake Frame is handmade in England with freehand machine embroiderery detailing and applique.

*Once you have placed your order please send me a seperate  email with the names, date and venue you would like embroided on*

Frame Size - 33cm x 28cm

Frame may differ slightly from the one shown.

name: Personalised Bouquet Tokens
description:
AS FEATURED IN YOU & YOUR WEDDING MAGAZINE
MARCH/APRIL 13 ISSUE

You & Me Bouquet Tokens are the perfect personal and unique addition to either the bride or bridesmaids bouquets. You can personalise your wedding bouquet with a handmade token and it will be a permanent reminder of your day once your flowers have passed their best.  

You can have the wording 'You & Me' and your wedding date hand stamped onto the token or you can choose your own wording that is special to you and your groom. It can even be your lucky charm for the day! Just place your order and pop me a little email regarding your wording requirements.

100% cotton fabrics, hand printed with a button attachment and twine to tie around your bouquet.

Fabrics are green floral and cream.

Size - Approx 11cm x 7cm

name: Flowergirl posie
description:
A smaller version of the Bridesmaid Posie which has 3 flowers and stems. This is the perfect posie for your flowergirl as the petals cannot be pulled apart easily like they can with real flowers, which is especially helpful for young children. The posie is also light in weight, so young children can easily hold it.
The Flowergirl posie makes the perfect gift and keepsake for your little flowergirls.

Choose from the colour options as pictured. You can select 3 different colours or stick to the 1 colour. It is entirely up to you and the colour palette for your wedding day.

If you are having a mix of colours please email me this selection once you have placed your order.

name: Hubby & Wifey Love Hearts
description:
Hubby & Wifey Love Hearts are the perfect and unique little token for a bride and groom. 

They can be used as a table decoration on the head table, over the back of the bride and Grooms chairs, on the wedding bouquet or even on the door of the bridal suite at the end of the night! 

The 'Hubby and Wifey' love hearts can be changed to 'Hubby & Hubby' or 'Wifey & Wifey' if required, just select in the drop down box below.

Fabrics are 100% cotton available in rose print with pink mini polka dot and cream mini floral.

Filled with dried English Lavender

Size - Approx 12cm x 12cm each. Price is for both hearts.

name: Special Mum Lavender Heart
description:
Special Mum Lavender Heart is an ideal gift for your mum this Mother's Day, or to show her you love her at any time of the year.

Each heart is made from green floral cotton fabric and has a mini floral print heart appliqued on and then a smaller pink mini dot heart stitched and then hand printed with the words 'Special Mum'.

Each heart is 100% cotton and is filled with dried English lavender and has a ribbon hook tie to hang it from.

Size - Approx 12cm x 12cm

DO NOT WASH

name: Spring Blossom Bunting
description:
AS FEATURED ON E4's MADE IN CHELSEA

Spring Blossom bunting is a great way to create that country cottage charm and add the party spirit into your home, garden or party venue.

A combination of pink mini floral and stripe, cream polka dot and green polka dot fabrics have been used to create this spring bunting.

Size - Each length of the Spring Blossom Bunting is 2.5 metres long and has a total of 9 double sided flags. Each flag is approx 20cm x 20cm.
All fabrics are 100% cotton.

name: Vintage Rose Bunting
description:
AS FEATURED ON E4's MADE IN CHELSEA

Vintage Rose bunting is a great way to create that country cottage charm and add the party spirit into your home, garden or party venue.

A combination of pink vintage rose, pink floral and stripe and pink polka dot fabrics have been used to create this spring bunting.

Size - Each length of the Vintage Rose Bunting is 2.5 metres long and has a total of 9 double sided flags. Each flag is approx 20cm x 20cm.
All fabrics are 100% cotton.

name: Festive Bunting
description:
Festive Bunting is a lovely way to add some 'good old' traditional party spirit into every room this festive season. 

Using a combination of red ticking stripe, red stars and red mini polka dot fabrics to create this festive bunting.

Each length of the Festive Bunting is handmade in Great Britain 

Size - each flag is approx 20cm x 20cm.
Length - 2.5 metres
Total of 9 double sided flags

Washing is not recommended as it may cause fraying.

name: I Love You Lavender Heart
description:
I love you Lavender heart is an ideal gift for Valentines day or for any special day of the year.

Filled with dried lavender it will make your home smell yummy as well as looking pretty!

Available in red polka dot with a vintage rose fabric heart appliqued on and then the words 'I Love You' hand stamped on the pink polka dot fabric and appliqued onto the heart with a pink gingham ribbon tie to hang it from.

Size - approx 12cm x 12cm

name: Red Mini Polka Dot Bow Draught Excluder
description:
*FEATURED IN NOVEMBERS ISSUE OF EASY LIVING MAGAZINE*

The Red Mini polka dot By Alex Draught Excluder is the perfect addition to your draughty door! During the cold winter months block out the winter chills and add a touch of country charm to your doorway. 

The bow is reversible and washable and can be tied with either the mini red polka dot or the vintage rose floral on show.

Each Draught excluder is handmade in the UK and filled with polyester filling and is 100% cotton and Linen.
 
Size - Approx 90cm x 16cm

name: Candy Stripe Bow Draught Excluder
description:
The Candy Stripe Bow Draught Excluders is the perfect addition to your draughty door! During the cold winter months block out the winter chills and add a touch of country charm to your doorway.

The Bow is reversible and washable and can be tied with either the stripe or the mini floral on show.

Each Draught Excluder is handmade in the UK and filled with polyester filling and is 100% cotton and Linen.
 
Size - Approx 90cm x 16cm

name: Red Ticking Stripe Bow Cushion
description:
The red ticking stripe bow cushion is new for Autumn/winter 11 and has a reversible, removable and washable bow on the front of the cushion cover. All fabrics used in the cushion cover are 100% linen and cotton and are filled with a feather cushion pad. Every Cushion is handmade in the UK.

Also available with a red mini polka dot bow.

Each cushion has a two button fastener on the back.

Size - approx 36cm x 36cm

name: Red Mini Polka Dot Bow Cushion
description:
By Alex cushions are perfect to help create a country cottage feel to your home. Transform your sofa, chair or bed into a cosy, welcoming place to relax.

The red mini polka dot bow cushion is new for Autumn/winter 11 and has a reversible, removable and washable bow on the front of the cushion cover. All fabrics used in the cushion cover are 100% linen and cotton and are filled with a feather cushion pad. Every Cushion is handmade in the UK.

Also available with a red ticking stripe bow.

Each cushion has a two button fastener on the back.

Size - approx 36cm x 36cm

Please note - due to the cushion being handmade there may be slight fabric/detail alterations from the images shown, but still just as lovely x

Also available in other five other colours too.

Each Draught excluder is filled with polyester filling and is 100% cotton.
Size - Approx 90cm x 16cm
